content:
Hey all,

Clippy noob question: using the master toolchain to get deps like rustc_ast kills the VSCode extension due to the latter running rustup component list --toolchain master, when master doesn't support components. Since I don't think I'm doing anything particularly weird, just thought I'd check: am I just hosed? No IDE functionality while hacking on Clippy? I googled a bit, but nothing promising yet.

(first Zulip post so sorry if I break any etiquette)
you might get more answers in #clippy
